description: Add support for listing hosted zones by name and getting the hosted zone count.

Remove ``--recursive`` parameter. The ``sync`` command is always a recursive operation meaning the inclusion or exclusion of ``--recursive`` had no effect on the ``sync`` command. (`issue 1171 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1171>`__)
Fix issue where ``--endpoint-url`` was being ignored (`issue 1142 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1142>`__)
